scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=local_dev&& npm run build && node build/index.js
scripts.dev:unix: export NODE_ENV=local_dev && npm run build && node build/index.js
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:dev:image && npm run deploy:dev:container
scripts.deploy:dev:container: gcloud run deploy dev-backend --image gcr.io/handl-425522/handl-backend-dev:latest --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --service-account dev-backend-identity
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prod:image && npm run deploy:prod:container
scripts.deploy:prod:container: gcloud run deploy prod-backend --image gcr.io/handl-425522/handl-backend-prod:latest --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
